price: Enti aseda no wͻ Nyankopͻn, ͻsoro Wura ne asaase Wura, Abͻdeε nyinaa Wura no.
arabic: فَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَرَبِّ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: falillahi al-ḥamdu rabbi al-samāwāti warabbi al-arḍi rabbi al-ʿālamīna
